reviewText: I enjoyed this drama. It really gives you an appreciation for life and makes you not want to take things for granted. The captions are literal translation, so it is hard to follow if you aren't used to the Japanese language. A few times I had to pause and think for a minute, but other than that, the show is awesome. I highly recommend it if you like supernatural shows. It's not super supernatural, but it's the closest word that I can use to describe it.
